job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The Software Engineer is part of the Software Applications Development Team and is responsible for analyzing component requirements, designing software solutions, and implementing Bigfoot software systems on mobile and cloud platforms. Bigfoot Software Engineers are also responsible for developing and maintaining automated software component tests and test frameworks. The right person for this role will be a detail-oriented, results-oriented self starter with the flexibility to adapt to change in a fast-paced startup environment.Essential Duties and ResponsibilitiesSoftware Development: Design and Implement component software requirements; Write detailed design documentation; Implement automated tests for component requirementsTest Frameworks: Implement and maintain testing frameworks and infrastructureDevOps: Implement and maintain CI and CD infrastructureSkills & Experience Requirements2+ years recent hands-on software development experience in a lean/agile environment.Proficient in Java and Typescript or Javascript.Experience building Web Applications, Mobile Applications, and RESTful web services.Experience with writing tests and using test frameworks.Ability to rapidly learn and adopt new skills and technology.Strong written and verbal communication skills.Detail oriented, self-motivated, self-organizing, and committed to delivering high quality work.Additionally, the ideal candidate will possess the following:Experience with React and React NativeExperience with iOS development (Swift) and Android development (Java/Kotlin)Experience with AWS including EC2, Kinesis, Redis, Elastic SearchStrong technical and leadership skills: decisive, determined, strategic, and able to lead, motivate, and inspire others.Education RequirementsBSc STEMs or higher
